meanings.definition: A handle or knob on a door that is used to open or close it.
meanings.sent1: I turned the doorknobs to enter the room.
meanings.sent2: The shiny doorknobs on the front door were difficult to grip.
meanings.sent3: Why did the doorknobs go to school? To get a handle on things!
meanings.sent4: The doorknobs of opportunity are always there, waiting to be turned.
meanings.sent5: The golden doorknobs gleamed in the sunlight, inviting guests inside.

meanings.definition: The round, often metal, object on a door that is turned to open or close it.
meanings.sent1: She polished the doorknobs until they sparkled.
meanings.sent2: The doorknobs rattled as someone tried to force the door open.
meanings.sent3: The doorknobs whispered secrets to each other late at night.
meanings.sent4: His words were like rusty doorknobs, difficult to turn and open up to.
meanings.sent5: The antique doorknobs added a touch of elegance to the old house.
